Title: Love on the Ground
Writer: Pascal Bonitzer (scenario), Marilù Parolini (scenario), Suzanne Schiffman (scenario), Jacques Rivette (scenario), Pascal Bonitzer (dialogue), Marilù Parolini (dialogue)
Actors: Jane Birkin, Geraldine Chaplin, André Dussollier, Isabelle Linnartz
Plot: A play within a play within a play within a play. Actors perform a play in a house, an audience member invites them to work in his own home improvising a play around his own life. The line between fiction and reality blur.
